**Please note these notebooks are still under development**

This short series of R-notebooks will go though how to visuliase differnt types of neuroimaging data in R. We will go though:

 * Voxel-level 
 * ROI-level
 * Edge-level
 
 


These notebooks were developed to be presented at the TrainTrack 2021 edition of the [OHBM BrainHack](https://ohbm.github.io/hackathon2021/).

You can workthough these notebooks on RStudio Cloud, or locally.
